wifi_wifi_basic.lang_network_mode_alert_5g_mixed_title: WARNING: Your Wireless-N devices will only operate at Wireless-A data rates with the encryption type you have chosen.  Please select WPA2-Personal or WPA2-Enterprise encryption if you would like to have your Wireless-N devices operating at full data rates.  Click OK to continue with this selection, or Cancel to choose another type of encryption.
wifi_wifi_basic.lang_network_mode_alert_nonly_title: Your wireless security mode is not compatible with Wireless-N Only mode. To use Wireless-N Only mode and disable wireless security, click OK. (To enable wireless security, set up WPA2-Personal on the Wireless Security screen.) Otherwise, click Cancel.
wifi_wifi_basic.lang_network_mode_alert_2_4g_mixed_title: WARNING: Your Wireless-N devices will only operate at Wireless-G data rates with the encryption type you have chosen.  Please select WPA2-Personal or WPA2-Enterprise encryption if you would like to have your Wireless-N devices operating at full data rates.  Click OK to continue with this selection, or Cancel to choose another type of encryption.
wifi_wifi_basic.lang_wps_disable_title: Your new setting will disable Wi-Fi Protected Setup. Do you want to continue?
wifi_wifi_basic.lang_network_name_alert_ssid_5g_same_gn_: Wireless 5G SSID same as Guest SSID, Please Change.
wifi_wifi_basic.lang_network_name_alert_ssid_2_4g_same_g: Wireless 2.4G SSID same as Guest SSID, Please Change.
